thread.title: Jude & John
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Jude & John

author: Jude & John
title: Jude & John
text:
From the beginning we felt confident in handing the sale of our 2 bedroom unit in Alphington to Peter Egan of Nelson Alexander, Northcote. Interestingly he had sold us the property approximately 12 years ago.
The pre auction preparation was conducted in a most professional and caring manner and we were kept informed every step of the way.
The auction met our expectations and the negotiation following was exemplary.
